name: smart-investment-portal
description: Smart Investment Portal - A comprehensive real estate investment platform

scripts.build: npm run --prefix packages/config build && npm run --prefix packages/db build && npm run --prefix packages/ui build && npm run --prefix apps/web build
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run db:generate && npm run db:push
scripts.setup:dev: npm run setup && npm run dev
scripts.build:packages: npm run --prefix packages/config build && npm run --prefix packages/db build && npm run --prefix packages/ui build
scripts.build:web: npm run build:packages && npm run --prefix apps/web build
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run db:migrate:deploy
